law.catch_line: Group policy issued in another state.
law.text: Group long-term care insurance coverage shall not be offered to a resident of Kentucky under a group policy issued in another state to a group described in KRS 304.14-600(5)(d) unless the commissioner or the insurance supervisory official of another state having statutory and regulatory long-term care insurance requirements substantially similar to KRS 304.14-600 to 304.14-625, has made a determination that these requirements have been met. Certificates of group long-term care insurance shall be filed with the commissioner as required by KRS 304.14-120.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1164, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 304, sec. 13, effective July 15, 2002. -- Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 423, sec. 3, effective July 14, 1992.
